alert.note: Alert for Gove; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 1:48AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SHERIDAN AND NORTH CENTRAL GOVE COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM CDT... At 147 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Gove, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grainfield around 155 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 87 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
